name: The Legend of the Ultimate Dragon
name_original: The Legend of the Ultimate Dragon
description:
Story:
A little dragon is thinking BIG. It is dreaming to be a powerful dragon. It starts with thinking of a gorgeous name. Then it finds a new accessory and a new transport tool. It travels in the sky and goes up and down...

Attitude determines its day but everyday is a new day. Let’s help the little dragon to make everyday more beautiful.

How to play:
1. Click the screen for the next dialogue.
2. Press ↑↓←→ or W, A, S, D to move the little dragon when it is flying in the sky.
3. Refresh the webpage if you want to restart the game.
4. Press the NEXT arrow if you want to continue playing.
